text: mesēma samānayan tabā namadinnangen bohomayak denā (tamanma) tamangē daruvanva marā dæmīma ovun alaṁkāravat lesa dakina sē ovungē devivarun æti kara, ovunva pātālayehi tallū kara, ovungē dharmayada avul kara dæmūha. allāh adahas kara tibunē nam, ovun mesē karannaṭa iḍa notibiṇi. ebævin (nabiyē!) oba ovunvada ovungē boru kiyamanda vīsi kara damanu
